issue.title: shazoo.ru
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://shazoo.ru/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fshazoo.ru%2F) ### Comment > С включеным adguard просто черный экран, без сайт загружается нормально. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/k0ux9a170v4ggsk0skcwcgccso8c4sklnmqc33rohs.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/29bt27spp7b4w4w40s40sws0wso8cccldvfi36w3ts.png?nc=1)

AdGuard Base

AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social widgets:

AdGuard Russian,
AdGuard Dutch,
AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese,
AdGuard French Filters last update: | November 03, 2025 at 18:38 Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=ext&product_version=5.2.112.84&system_version=Windows+11&manifest_version=2&browser=edge&filters=1.2.3.4.8.9.16&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=false&filters_last_update=2025-11-03T18%3A38%3A27)

issue.title: www.primevideo.com
issue.body:
